data.title: Todays Exchange Rates
data.meta_description: Our rates table instantly shows how other currencies are faring against the UAE Dirham. You can also take advantage of our  currency convertor tool to calculate live currency and foreign exchange rates.
data.text:
Buying or selling a property? Relocating? Investing overseas?

Whatever your major life decisions, we understand that volatile exchange rates make a huge difference when you choose to move your money. At Al Fardan Exchange, we offer a service that’s dedicated to your personal requirements to make your large transfers simple, fast and cost-effective. This way, while we take care you’re money matters, you can concentrate on what matters.

Currency Converter

Use our convenient convertor tool to see how much your money is worth in another currency.

Cash Rate

Transfer Rate

(Rates are indicative only and subject to change at any time.)
